Tactical_Action_Plan_Bobilli.Scrap: SR furnace design this much scrap continuously generated, need to improve automation for reduction, work under progress
Tactical_Action_Plan_Bobilli.Dispatch: Less dispatch because of low production at customer end, explore another customer
Tactical_Action_Plan_Bobilli.Power consumption: 15th august maintenance work without production and SR temp increase from 315 to 350 degree.
Tactical_Action_Plan_Bobilli.Breakdown: /U-1 take-up-3 shaft broken because of manufacturing defect near step ./ U1 - Wd/02 Block -07 Drum Worm Shaft Bearing Broken Because of bearing cage damage because of lubricant burnt now replace with new oil / Unit - 01 Take up no 03 Motor Burnt. Because of over load not functioning properly and motor burn

Tactical_Action_Plan_Bokaro.Dispatch: Dispatched Internal Target: 954 MT – Dispatched Qty. 942.93 MT. Dispatched External Target : 870 MT – Dispatched Qty. 397.95 MT. Target: 1824 MT . Dispatched Qty. 1340.88 MT. Balance Qty. 483.12 MT Carry forward to September-2025 as per the out side Customer requirement’s. We will request our Customer to take 100% Inspected Material as per the dispatch plan. So that Dispatch will be carry out as per the Plan.
Tactical_Action_Plan_Bokaro.Losses: 1. Regarding Power Cut from DVC side 09 Hrs. 10Min. Same we are keep in touch with the DVC Chief Engineer to avoid Load Shedding. 2. WD-4 Block No-3 Worm Gear & Shaft damaged breakdown for 04hrs.. To avoid this type of issue we have increase checking frequency with proper monitoring & making new one as a spare.

Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Production: Achieved 991 MT, Target of 1100 MT (90%) Power cut 47 hr & 40 min & breakdown 110 hr
Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Action Plan: New on-roll labours 7 joined (total 33) in Aug & new GOD switch installed/DG Sync busbar connection done

Dispatch.Internal Dispatched Qty: 606 MT, Target: 701 MT (86%) Udavada 80MT not dispatched due to low production
Dispatch.External Dispatched Qty: 462 MT, Target: 776 MT (60%) Bissau late inspection done & Hanumangarh taken only 50MT due accident at their plant

Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Action Plan Dispatch: Already initiated Sholaka-RITES inspection in AUG for SEP dispatch & increase production
Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Power Consumption: Achieved 336 units against target of 325 units Low production due to high power cut & high breakdown
Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Action Plan Power Consumption: VCB, ACB, DG, Transformer servicing planned in Sep-25 & also complaint AVVNL for frequent power cuts.
Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Losses: Breakdown of 110 hours (STD-2, 3 & WD-1) (STD-3 cradle bend, STD-2 bobbin fly & WD-1 worm shaft bearing broken)
Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Action Plan Losses: New cradle manufacturing under process & procure forging shaft 55mm round for spare shaft which can serve all 7 STD m/c
Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Safety: One near miss & 3 first aid reported
Tactical_Action_Plan_Roopangarh.Action Plan Safety: 100% PPE done with EHS audit scheduled
